db:abstract.db:para: Shows how to make a few different polar chart in your QML application.

db:note.db:para: This is part of the Charts with QML Gallery example.

db:article.db:para: We begin with a chart that has a spline series and a scatter series with random data. Both series use the same axes.
The next chart shows some accurate historical data for which we need to use a DateTimeAxis and a AreaSeries.
The next chart uses a CategoryAxis to make the data easier to understand.
